articles.author: Brad Brooks, Jonathan Allen, Steve Gorman
articles.description: A total solar eclipse will have millions of people across a heavily populated swath of North America gazing toward the heavens on Monday as the moon completely blocks the sun for more than four minutes in some locales.
articles.title: Millions across North America await total solar eclipse
